attributes.title: Trump 2020 app
attributes.review: Complete trash the app didn’t work 75% of the time and only helped a Cheeto build an empire on the blood sweat and tears of a whole generation that ate tide pods and banded together to get him off his throne.   #WeStillFight

attributes.title: OUTRAGEOUS
attributes.review: THIS APP IS HORRIBLE SO MANY BUGS, this app stole my information and my identity was stolen. HORRIBLE HORRIBLE HORRIBLE the worst app ever I don’t even know why Cheeto man has an app like AppStore you need to take it down it’s disgusting and degrading and I hate itttttt

attributes.title: So bad
attributes.review: i hated it😤. it took 3 days JUST to download. please fix this. i can’t even begin to speak on how disrespectful this app is to our great (horrible) nation🙄. anyways. vote anonymous for president🥰😩💖🧚🏽‍♀️💕😌🙈

attributes.title: The worst
attributes.review: It literally drained my phone battery so quick and it took hours for it to download

attributes.title: the worst.
attributes.review: this app is just terrible. it made me phone completely tweak for no reason and took foreverrrrrr to download. i do NOT recommend.

attributes.title: do not waste your time
attributes.review: the app is a scam and immediately asks for your credit card information and social security number after downloading it. it also took about 70 hours to completely download onto my phone. do not waste your time trying to get this

attributes.title: TOXIC LIKE TRUMP
attributes.review: completely crashed my phone and caused it to overheat and my screen turned orange! Uninstalled immediately after my siri started saying racist things to me.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: I’ve used many apps but this is honestly the worst one yet. I don’t even need to give an explanation, you already know.

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY TERRIBLE
attributes.review:
Where do I start

-Took forever to download (2 weeks to be exact)

-Started to glitch once it finally downloaded 

-!!USED UP ALL MY STORAGE!!

-My phone started overheating all of a sudden when I downloaded this

-!!!SO MICH MORE!!!

If I could give it zero start or even negative I would. I don’t even know why this app exist just like our president.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: the app kept slowly down whenever i opened it and gave my phone and everything linked with my apple id a virus!! so bad🤬
